title: The Great Gatsby
description: A story of the fabulously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel that deals with the serious issues of rape and racial inequality in the American South.
A dystopian social science fiction novel that explores the dangers of totalitarianism and mass surveillance.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that follows the emotional development of the protagonist Elizabeth Bennet.

title: The Hobbit
description: A fantasy novel that tells the story of Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, a tale of magic, friendship, and adventure.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A novel about a teenage boy named Holden Caulfield and his experiences in New York City.

title: Lord of the Flies
description: A novel that explores the dark side of human nature as a group of boys are stranded on an uninhabited island.

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: A mystery thriller novel that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he investigates a murder in the Louvre Museum.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian science fiction novel that explores the potential dangers of a technologically advanced world.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: A psychological novel that explores the mental anguish and moral dilemmas of an impoverished ex-student.

title: Moby Dick
description: A novel that follows Ishmael's sea voyage and his obsession with the elusive white whale, Moby Dick.

title: The Odyssey
description: An epic ancient Greek poem attributed to Homer, telling the story of Odysseus's journey home from the Trojan War.

title: Frankenstein
description: A novel that explores themes of creation, morality, and the consequences of scientific advancement.

title: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical novel following the journey of Santiago, a shepherd boy.

title: Great Expectations
description: A novel following the life and personal development of an orphan named Pip.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A philosophical novel about the consequences of eternal youth and beauty.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A novel exploring the destructive effects of jealousy and vengefulness.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
description: A collection of detective stories featuring Sherlock Holmes and his friend Dr. John Watson.

title: The Road
description: A post-apocalyptic novel following the journey of a father and his young son over a period of several months across a landscape blasted by an unspecified cataclysm.
